constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 100 (Monday, June 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ISSA:
H.R. 8037.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to Article I, Section 8,
Clause 18 of the Constitution of the United States.
[Page H5487]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Emergency Preparedness, Response, and Recovery.

title: Nonprofit and School Security Grant Program Act
